section.heading: Data collection and reporting.

para.text: By July 1 of each year, DDOT shall publicly post on the DDOT website:
The number of driver-involved crashes, fatalities, or major injuries that occurred within 1/4 of a mile of a public school in the preceding year, by school;
A list of fulfilled and outstanding spot safety assessments in each school zone and 1/4 of a mile walk shed;
The deployment plan for traffic control officers for the upcoming year; and
The number of bike racks within the school zone.

Law 24-285 is subject to the inclusion of the law’s fiscal effect in an approved budget and financial plan. Therefore that amendment has not been implemented.
